p.s: The text Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects by Mitra, Ankita published at February 5, 2014, is about the environmental pollution of the world.
Mitra, Ankita describes, that the pollution, can have terrible effects on the natural world and on the people.
In addition, she says, that without the water and the air, our planet would be like the othersother planets.
No people, no animals and no plants.
She also said, that the technology and the industrialization put the plants and the air in danger.
Furthermore, the sea life is also in danger.
Also automobiles and other traffic contaminate both air and water.
Mitra AnnikaAnkita says, that the pollution is getting more bad.
She wants to tell us, that we have to do something against the environmental pollution.
